title: Crimes Against Humanity (Adult Content)
description:
Black and White.  Original Footage from 1945.  Aspect Ratio is 4:3  Commentary is English.  Many parts of this footage have no commentary, just the original film sounds.

This footage is ADULT ONLY and contains many images of real people, worked and starved to death sometimes Murdered and shown in this film often in poor condition with decay and decomposition visible.  

It is a timely reminder when popularity themes get people elected that BritExit, Donald Trump and many others riding this nasty turn of events of anti immigration EU workers and nastionalism in human history can go so badly wrong... AGAIN.  

Bosnia, Serbia and how much more.  Pay attention and learn from history.

Thank you to the original seeder.  I do hope you do not mind this timely update of your hard work.  Source documentary date and broadcaster unknown. Sounds like the BBC to me but not sure.

I am very sorry if this source material is deeply upsetting to you, but someone has to remind the World every now and again of HISTORICAL FACTS before they are written off the record books by people like TRUMP and others riding the wave of popular isolation and nations first voting.

We all live on ONE WORLD.  ONE RACE. ONE SURVIVAL PLAN and time is running out.

My HEART GOES OUT to those in Modern times in Europe, Serbia, Yeman, Middle East and Africa who are facing the exact same events shown here.

Rigmar Radio - Seeding to the World since 2004
